= virtualenv =
a virutal environment that spearate operation system's python.

== install =
{{{
sudo pip install virtualenv
}}}

== create a virtual environment for python ==
{{{
virtualenv py
}}}

== activate the virtual environment ==
{{{
source ./py/bin/activate
}}}

== pip install for the virtual environment ==
{{{
source ./py/in/activate
pip install xxx
}}}
